## SigmaOtpSDK.onSuccessConfirmation() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Подписывается на событие успешного подтверждения

**Signature:**

```typescript
onSuccessConfirmation(requestId: string, handler: (...args: SigmaOtpSDKGlobalEvents[SigmaOtpSDKGlobalEventNames.SUCCESS_CONFIRMATION]) => void): {
		unsubscribe: () => import("events")<SigmaOtpSDKGlobalEvents & {
			[x: `error-${string}`]: [
				{
					requestId: string;
					error: IError | import("@nestjs/common").HttpException;
					rawError?: unknown;
				}
			];
			[x: `channel-changed-${string}`]: [
				{
					requestId: string;
					error: Exceptions.ChannelChangedException;
				}
			];
			[x: `resend-channel-${string}`]: [
				{
					requestId: string;
					error: Exceptions.ResendChannelException;
				}
			];
			[x: `success-confirmation-${string}`]: [
				{
					requestId: string;
				}
			];
		} & {
			"handled-error": [
				{
					requestId: string;
					error?: IError;
					rawError?: unknown;
				}
			];
		}>;
	};
```
